author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Use of physics lists in the tests of Geant4 using HGCal TB data

#### PR validation:

Use standard runTheMatrix.py and also use private tests with the new physics lists

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim67 Add 2 physics lists for use in verification using HGCal TB data
